locations.name: Your Dorm Room - Chestnut Residence
locations.long_description:
LOCATION 0 - Your Dorm Room (Chestnut Residence)

You wake up gasping. 11:45am. Project due at 1pm. Your USB drive, charger, and lucky mug are GONE.

Your laptop screen glows with a message: 'They're watching. I hid your items. Follow the riddles. Arrange them in the circle when you find all three. Only then will the truth appear. - Your Partner'

What truth? What's happening?

Exit: EAST to hallway

locations.name: Chestnut Hallway
locations.long_description:
LOCATION 1 - Chestnut Hallway

The hallway is empty. Too empty. A COFFEE cup sits on the floor with a note: 'DRINK ME to see beyond the deadline. The first item waits where knowledge sleeps in stacks.' A riddle!

Exits: WEST (your room), NORTH (outside to campus)

locations.name: Outside Chestnut - Campus Path
locations.long_description:
LOCATION 2 - Outside Chestnut Residence

You step outside. King's College Circle is to the NORTH. You can return SOUTH to Chestnut.

A crow watches you from a tree. Eerie.

Exits: SOUTH (Chestnut), NORTH (King's College Circle)

locations.name: Sidney Smith Hall
locations.long_description:
LOCATION 3 - Sidney Smith Hall

The humanities building. Shadows move in corners. Tim Hortons is INSIDE to the WEST. Robarts Library is to the NORTH. Bahen Center is to the SOUTH. St. George Street is EAST.

Exits: WEST (Tim Hortons), NORTH (Robarts), SOUTH (Bahen), EAST (St. George)

locations.name: St. George Street (North)
locations.long_description:
LOCATION 4 - St. George Street (North Section)

The main campus road. Robarts Library looms to the WEST. Sidney Smith Hall is WEST as well (through the path).

A chalk mark on the ground: Three points make truth visible.

Exits: WEST (Sidney Smith)

locations.name: Robarts Library - Ground Floor
locations.long_description:
LOCATION 5 - Robarts Library - Ground Floor

The fortress of knowledge. A librarian whispers: 'Your partner left something UP in the stacks. They seemed... frightened. Mentioned a ritual?'

Exits: SOUTH (Sidney Smith), UP (upper stacks)

locations.name: Robarts Library - Upper Stacks
locations.long_description:
LOCATION 6 - Robarts Library - Upper Stacks

Rows of books. YOUR USB DRIVE sits on a desk with a riddle: 'When three relics rest in the founding circle, the fourth shall manifest. The BLUE GUARDIAN holds the key.' What does that mean?

Exit: DOWN (ground floor)

locations.name: Bahen Center - Ground Floor
locations.long_description:
LOCATION 7 - Bahen Center - Ground Floor

CS building. Students work frantically. A LOCKED SERVER ROOM is to the SOUTH. A keypad shows symbols: ◆ ◆ ◆ ◆. Lecture halls are UP. King's College Circle is to the EAST.

A note pinned to wall: 'When UofT was born, so was the code.'

Exits: NORTH (Sidney Smith), UP (lecture halls), EAST (King's College Circle), SOUTH (server room - locked)

locations.name: Bahen Lecture Hall BA3200
locations.long_description:
LOCATION 8 - BA3200 Lecture Hall

Your usual lecture hall. YOUR LAPTOP CHARGER is in the back row with a note: 'The SILVER CONDUCTOR must join the circle. Two items call for the third.'

Exit: DOWN (ground floor)

locations.name: Tim Hortons - Sidney Smith
locations.long_description:
LOCATION 9 - Tim Hortons (Sidney Smith Hall)

The coffee shop. YOUR LUCKY MUG sits on a table with the final riddle: 'The GOLDEN VESSEL completes the trinity. Bring all three to where founders walked. Drop them in pattern. Truth awaits.'

Exit: EAST (Sidney Smith)

locations.name: King's College Circle
locations.long_description:
LOCATION 10 - King's College Circle

The FOUNDING CIRCLE of UofT. The green lawn is eerily still. Bahen Center is to the WEST. Gerstein Library is to the EAST. Chestnut is to the SOUTH.

Three chalk marks form a triangle on the ground. This is where the ritual happens!

Exits: WEST (Bahen), EAST (Gerstein), SOUTH (Chestnut)

locations.name: Gerstein Science Library
locations.long_description:
LOCATION 11 - Gerstein Science Library

The science library. Through the window, you see someone watching you. They hold up a sign: 'DROP THE THREE IN THE CIRCLE. TRUTH WILL APPEAR.'

Your partner! They're guiding you!

Exit: WEST (King's College Circle)

locations.name: Bahen Server Room
locations.long_description:
LOCATION 12 - Bahen Server Room

Servers hum. You find a printed document: 'Project deadline EXTENDED to 2pm - system maintenance. Also: Critical bug found in your code. I fixed it. The backup will appear when you complete the ritual. - Partner'

They were protecting you!

Exit: NORTH (Bahen ground)

items.name: USB Drive
items.description: BLUE USB drive with U of T sticker. The BLUE GUARDIAN. Contains your project code, but your partner mentioned a bug...

items.name: Laptop Charger
items.description: Silver laptop charger. The SILVER CONDUCTOR. Your partner borrowed it to work all night fixing your code.

items.name: Lucky Mug
items.description: Gold-crested U of T mug. The GOLDEN VESSEL. Your partner used it during their all-night debugging session.

items.name: coffee
items.description: Warm coffee with note: 'DRINK ME to see beyond the deadline.' Gives you extra time (+5 moves).

items.name: clue_paper
items.description: Official document: 'Project deadline EXTENDED to 2pm - server maintenance.' Plus your partner's handwritten note: 'Found CRITICAL BUG that would cause instant failure. Fixed it overnight. The ritual will summon the corrected version with everything you need. Submit THAT version, not the old buggy USB. - Your Partner'

items.name: backup_usb
items.description: FIXED USB drive that appears after ritual! This is the corrected version your partner created. Submit THIS one!
